name: Tea And Time
description:
This game is intended to be played with a Makey Makey (see this video), but you can also play with the keyboard's left and right arrows.

One vs one competition about who has the most accurate notion of time.

Submission for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W8 2017.

Done in three hours. But coming with this idea took even longer.

Cymbal by ianhall licensed under the Attribution License.

Remix of Chinese flute by Timbre licensed under the Attribution Noncommercial License.

Hand (low poly) by Anura is licensed under CC Attribution.
